title: Camp celtique de la Bure
description: A Gallo-Roman settlement of a commercial nature located on the Meurthe river. Archaeological evidence for earthworks, as well as ritual activity, has been discovered. The Gallo-Roman ramparts, in a later phase, make use of marble sculpture as spolia.

properties.description: Camp celtique de la Bure, commune Saint-Dié-des-Vosges, département Vosges.
properties.title: Location of the oppidum
